general_advidory: Light Rain is expected in the coming five days. Farmers may postpone irrigation in standing crops.

tomato.advisory: If fruit borer infestation is observed, spray any one of the insecticides Chlorantraniliprole 18.5% S.C @ 80 ml/acre or Flubendiamide 39.5 % M/M S.C @ 40 ml/acre or Indoxacarb 14.5% S.C. @ 200 ml/acre.

brinjal.advisory: During the primary stage of the shoot and fruit borer infestation in Brinjal, spray neem-based pesticide 1500 PPM @ 600-ml/acre by mixing in 200-liter of water.

cowpea.advisory: Downy mildew in beans has been observed in some places. For chemical management, spray 30 gm of Metalaxyl 8% + Mancozeb 64% with Thiamethoxam 3 gm in 14 lt of water.
